message: Welcome onboard this airline's service to Manchester Airport, our flight however is actually a train, so we will be calling at- Bramley, New Pudsey, Bradford Interchange, Low Moor, Halifax, Sowerby Bridge, Mytholmroyd, Hebden Bridge, Todmorden, Littleborough, Rochdale, Mills Hill, Manchester Victoria, Manchester Oxford Road, Manchester Piccadilly, Gatley, and Manchester Airport. We hope you enjoy this flight - please feel free to explore our wonderful entertainment collection here only at Streambox!
